thread.title: Court to hear Najib's application to intervene in Zaid's suit on June 1
thread.title_full: Court to hear Najib's application to intervene in Zaid's suit on June 1

title: Court to hear Najib's application to intervene in Zaid's suit on June 1
text:
More 
The Kuala Lumpur High Court has fixed June 1 to hear Prime Minister Najib Abdul Razak's application to intervene in former de-facto Law Minister Zaid Ibrahim's case against AmBank Islamic Berhad, for the financial institution to disclose the sources of funds in five accounts totalling US$731 million believed to be owned by the PM. 
The date was fixed by High Court deputy registrar Engku Nurul Ain Engku Muda during case management today. 
The date was fixed by High Court deputy registrar Engku Nurul Ain Engku Muda during case management today, Nor Hazira Abu Haiiyan, who was in court today, told Malaysiakini .
